|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wcel(c0, ccyg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| diffsc(hs1, co(nat0, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)))

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs1, co(nat0, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wcel(c0, ccyg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1[≅]1o)→ c0 ∈ CycGrp)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)

comment: The trivial group is cyclic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
